original_text:
Ghost Glyph
Ghost Glyph parte come una griglia di sette file orizzontali e sette verticali che possono produrre risultati vincenti formati da cluster. I giocatori possono scoprire un’avventura di media varianza il cui ritorno teorico al giocatore dovrebbe essere in media del 96,00% o poco più. Il potenziale di vincita massimo è 2000x moltiplicato per la scommessa vincente.
Il gioco spaventoso di Quickspin per l’Halloween 2020 sarà questo, Ghost Glyph, una slot machine con Cluster Pays e media volatilità, che includerà ogni sorta di caratteristiche interessanti.
Un gioco di fantasmi ed eventi spettrali sui rulli è stato evocato dagli esperti di slot di Quickspin come una slot a griglia. I giocatori troveranno un’avventura a bobina meravigliosamente carina che prevede vittorie a cascata o a valanga su una griglia che non ha un numero fisso di righe.
Una grafica veramente horror
I grafici e gli esperti di slot dell’azienda svedese hanno deciso di scegliere un tema allegro. Scherziamo, naturalmente. I fantasmi che sembrano aleggiare sopra la griglia non sono di tipo ossessivo, ma vogliono solo aiutare, offrendo modificatori di simboli e wilds.
La Slot Ghost Glyph ha simboli che possono essere divisi in tre categorie: gemme, gettoni e simboli extra. Le gemme sono simboli ad alto rendimento, i gettoni sono simboli a forma di moneta con varie incisioni, e ci sono i wilds e gli scatters.
I risultati vincenti sono contrassegnati da una luce spettrale intorno al gruppo di simboli. In caso di valanga di vittoria, i simboli sembrano evaporare nel nulla in modo fresco. L’audio è al passo con il gioco e si adatta perfettamente al tema.
I giocatori possono vivere un’avventura non così spettrale che coinvolge fantasmi sorridenti, gemme di vari colori e un insieme di caratteristiche in grado di far emergere il meglio del misterioso. Un simbolo jolly sostituisce i simboli a pagamento standard e una funzione di raccolta dei modificatore di bobina può scatenare sulla griglia diverse fiale piene di roba buona. Tutto sommato, La Slot Ghost Glyph sembra un gioco ben fatto di Quickspin.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Mentre formate i vostri Cluster di simboli vincenti, e venite pagati, ci sarà anche un Tumble Mechanic in gioco. I simboli che fanno parte di questi cluster verranno poi rimossi e permetteranno a quelli nuovi di cadere dall’alto. È possibile continuare a ottenere cluster e nuovi Tumbles in questo modo, fino a quando non ne arriveranno altri.
Il Glifo fantasma viene aggiunto in una posizione vuota, seguendo una meccanica Tumble. Ne viene dato uno per ognuno di questi meccanici, e poi viene usato come selvaggio, e aggiunto a un’Urna Fantasma. Si attivano nuove Urne ogni volta che ciò accade.
Prima dell’inizio del round, il gioco sceglie 5 Urne fantasma a caso, ma si può sempre contare sul fatto che l’Urna Blu sia quella finale. Le prime quattro saranno randomizzate, utilizzando le varianti rossa, verde e gialla. Man mano che si ottengono glifi come parte delle vittorie, queste Urne vengono attivate una ad una.
L’Urna Gialla vi dà più wilds sui rulli, fino a 10 aggiunti in un singolo giro.
Le Urne fantasma verdi, quando attivate, trasformeranno un tipo di simbolo di basso valore, in un altro, anch’esso di basso valore.
Tramite le Urne fantasma rosse, si ottiene la rimozione dei simboli di basso valore, selezionando un singolo tipo a caso.
I fantasmi blu, quelli finali che attiverete, vi faranno entrare nel gioco dei bonus, con giri gratuiti.
Infine, c’è anche il Massive Wild, che si può ottenere alla fine dei giri gratuiti, a determinate condizioni. È una caratteristica con 22 livelli.
Prima di iniziare a giocare è necessario familiarizzare con i comandi e i pulsanti. Questi si trovano nella parte inferiore del campo di gioco e, essendo una produzione Quickspin, Ghost Glyph ha l’aspetto e il layout familiare che si trova nella maggior parte dei giochi di questa azienda.
Per andare subito al sodo, il pulsante di gioco è il grande rettangolo arancione nell’angolo in basso a destra dello schermo. Premendo una volta quel pulsante, le bobine girano una volta per ogni puntata attiva, che viene visualizzata nell’altro rettangolo arancione verso il centro della barra dei comandi.
A sinistra di Spin ci sono due pulsanti: fast forward, che fa sì che la griglia crei e rimuova i simboli più velocemente e il pulsante per l’autoplay, che permette ai giocatori di selezionare un numero tra i preset dei giri automatici e di far giocare Ghost Glyph slot senza dover effettuare ingressi manuali.
Infine, ma non meno importante, la gamma di scommesse inizia a 20 centesimi per giro per la puntata minima e 100 euro per la massima. Si può arrivare a qualsiasi importo di scommessa disponibile premendo i pulsanti verso il basso e verso l’alto.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Siete pronti a beccare qualche fantasma e a giocare per avere la possibilità di vincere nella slot con il jackpot di IGT Ghostbusters Level Up Plus? Questo è il gioco che viene fornito con un’avventura dinamica sulle bobine che possono rivelare moltiplicatori fino a 25x, modificatori di bobine, un bonus di giri gratis e un serio potenziale per superare molti livelli che sono impilati con i booster.

raw_translation.response:
Ghost Glyph is a thrilling slot game that features a seven by seven grid with cluster pays. As an experienced gambler, you can expect a medium variance game with a theoretical return to player of roughly 96%, and a maximum win potential of 2000x your bet. Quickspin has designed a truly spooky game for Halloween 2020, complete with ghoulish events and ghostly happenings on the reels.

Expert slot designers have created a grid-based game with cascading or avalanche wins as symbols tumble into place. Ghost Glyph's graphics are truly horror-themed, with ghostly apparitions floating above the grid, ready to offer symbol modifiers and wilds.

The game features three types of symbols: gems, chips, and bonus symbols such as wilds and scatters. Clusters of winning symbols are marked by ghostly lights, and upon wins, symbols disappear in a cool evaporation effect. The audio is also well-suited to this game's mysterious theme.

Players can look forward to an adventure that involves friendly ghosts, colorful gems, and exciting features that bring out the best of the supernatural. A jolly joker symbol replaces standard paying symbols, and a reel modifier collection feature can activate several flasks filled with great stuff. Overall, Ghost Glyph is a well-crafted game by Quickspin.

In this game, you can form clusters of winning symbols, resulting in a tumble mechanic. Winning symbols disappear, making way for new symbols to cascade in place. This cycle repeats until no more wins are obtained.

A ghost glyph is added in an empty position, following the tumble mechanic. This glyph acts as a wild, and is collected in the ghost urn. The game selects five urns at random before the start of each round, with the blue urn being the last. Each urn has a unique feature, such as adding wilds to the reels, transforming low-paying symbols, removing low-paying symbols, and triggering free spins.

Ghost Glyph has a familiar control layout, with the spin button in a prominent orange rectangle in the lower right corner of the screen. To play, select your bet amount, and press the spin button. Other buttons include fast forward and autoplay. The betting range starts at 20 cents per spin for the minimum bet and goes up to 100 euros for the maximum bet.

If you're into ghost-themed slot games, you might want to check out Ghostbusters Level Up Plus, a dynamic game that can reveal multipliers of up to 25x, modify reels, and impress you with free spins.

raw_translation.response:
Ghost Glyph
Ghost Glyph starts as a grid of seven horizontal and seven vertical rows that can produce winning results formed by clusters. Experienced gamblers can embark on a medium-variance adventure with a theoretical return to player average of 96.00% or slightly higher. The maximum win potential is 2000x multiplied by the winning bet.
Quickspin's spooky Halloween 2020 game is Ghost Glyph, a Cluster Pays slot machine with medium volatility that includes all sorts of interesting features.
A ghostly and spectral event game on the reels has been summoned by Quickspin's expert slot developers as a grid slot. Players will find a wonderfully cute reel adventure that includes cascade or avalanche wins on a grid that does not have a fixed number of rows.
A truly creepy graphic
The graphics and slot experts of the Swedish company chose a cheerful theme. Of course, we are joking. The ghosts that seem to float above the grid are not of the obsessive type, but only want to help, offering symbol modifiers and wilds.
The Ghost Glyph slot has symbols that can be divided into three categories: gems, coins, and extra symbols. Gems are high-yield symbols, coins are coin-shaped symbols with various engravings, and there are wilds and scatters.
Winning results are marked by a spectral light around the group of symbols. In the case of a landslide victory, the symbols seem to evaporate into thin air in a cool way. The audio matches the game and fits perfectly with the theme.
Players can experience an adventure that is not so spooky involving smiling ghosts, various colored gems, and a set of features capable of bringing out the best in the mysterious. A wild symbol replaces standard paying symbols, and a reel modifier collection function can unleash various vials filled with good stuff on the grid. All in all, the Ghost Glyph slot seems like a well-crafted game from Quickspin.
Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine
As you form your winning symbol clusters and get paid, there will also be a Tumble Mechanic in play. Symbols that are part of these clusters will then be removed and allow new ones to fall from above. You can continue to get clusters and new tumbles in this way, until there are no more.
The Ghost Glyph Glyph is added in an empty position, following a Tumble mechanic. One is given for each of these mechanics and then used as a wild, and added to a Ghost Urn. New urns are activated every time this happens.
Before the round starts, the game chooses 5 random ghost urns, but you can always count on the blue urn being the final one. The first four will be randomized, using red, green, and yellow variants. As you get glyphs as part of your wins, these urns are activated one by one.
The yellow urn gives you more wilds on the reels, up to 10 added in a single round.
The green ghost urn, when activated, will transform one type of low-value symbol into another, also of low value.
Through the red ghost urn, you get the removal of low-value symbols, selecting a single random type.
The blue ghosts, the final ones you'll activate, will make you enter the bonus game with free spins.
Finally, there is also the Massive Wild, which can be obtained at the end of free spins, under certain conditions. It is a feature with 22 levels.
Before starting to play, you need to familiarize yourself with the controls and buttons. These are located at the bottom of the game field, and as a Quickspin production, Ghost Glyph has the familiar look and layout found in most of this company's games.
To get straight to the point, the game button is the large orange rectangle in the bottom right corner of the screen. Pressing that button once will cause the reels to spin once for each active bet, which is displayed in the other orange rectangle toward the center of the control bar.
To the left of Spin are two buttons: fast forward, which causes the grid to create and remove symbols more quickly, and the autoplay button, which allows players to select a number from preset automatic spins and play Ghost Glyph slot without having to make manual entries.
Last but not least, the betting range starts at 20 cents per spin for the minimum bet and 100 euros for the maximum. You can get to any available betting amount by pressing the buttons up and down.
Similar Slot Machines
Are you ready to catch some ghosts and play for the chance to win on the IGT Ghostbusters Level Up Plus jackpot slot? This is the game that comes with a dynamic adventure on the reels that can reveal multipliers up to 25x, reel modifiers, a free spins bonus, and serious potential to surpass many levels stacked with boosters.

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics and features

Ghost Glyph is a Cluster Pays slot machine with medium volatility that offers players cascade or avalanche wins on a grid that does not have a fixed number of rows. The Tumble mechanic is in play, allowing symbols that are part of a winning cluster to be removed and new ones to fall from above. Winning symbol clusters are marked by a spectral light, and a Ghost Glyph is added in an empty position as a wild following a Tumble mechanic. One is given for each of these mechanics and then used as a wild and added to a Ghost Urn. The game also includes a set of features that can bring out the best in the mysterious.

Symbols and categories

Ghost Glyph has symbols that can be divided into three categories: gems, coins, and extra symbols. Gems are high-yield symbols, coins are coin-shaped symbols with various engravings, and there are wilds and scatters. New urns are activated every time a Ghost Glyph is added in an empty position. Before the round starts, the game chooses 5 random ghost urns, but you can always count on the blue urn being the final one. The first four will be randomized, using red, green, and yellow variants.

Tumble mechanic and Ghost Glyph

Symbols that are part of winning clusters in Ghost Glyph are removed and allow new ones to fall from above. A Ghost Glyph is added in an empty position following a Tumble mechanic. One is given for each of these mechanics and then used as a wild and added to a Ghost Urn. New urns are activated every time this happens. There are five random ghost urns, but you can always count on the blue urn being the final one.

Urn features

As you get Ghost Glyphs as part of your wins, urns are activated one by one. The yellow urn gives you more wilds on the reels, up to 10 added in a single round. The green ghost urn, when activated, will transform one type of low-value symbol into another also of low value. Through the red ghost urn, you get the removal of low-value symbols, selecting a single random type. The blue ghosts will make you enter the bonus game with free spins.

Massive Wild feature

Finally, there is also the Massive Wild, which can be obtained at the end of free spins, under certain conditions. It is a feature with 22 levels.

Audio and theme

The graphics and audio of Quickspin's Ghost Glyph fit perfectly with the spooky, Halloween-themed game. The ghosts that float above the grid are not of the obsessive type, but only want to help, offering symbol modifiers and wilds. The audio matches the game and is in keeping with the cheerful but eerie theme.

Volatility, RTP, and maximum win potential

Experienced gamblers can embark on a medium-variance adventure with a theoretical return to player average of 96.00% or slightly higher. The maximum win potential is 2000x multiplied by the winning bet. The betting range starts at 20 cents per spin for the minimum bet and 100 euros for the maximum.
